battle_traits.name: Rhythm of the Chase
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battle_traits.declare: If there is no quarry on the battlefield, pick an enemy unit on the battlefield to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: The target is the quarry for the rest of the battle.

battle_traits.name: Opening Horn Blast
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Battle Round (Army), Start of Battle Round
battle_traits.declare:
You must use this ability at the start of the
battle round.
battle_traits.effect:
Your chords are reset to 0. Then, you gain 1 chord:

• If a friendly Belthanos is on the battlefield.
• For each friendly Evergreen Hunt unit that is wholly within the same large quarter of the battlefield as the quarry.
• For each quarry destroyed so far during the battle.

battle_traits.name: Song of the Hunt
battle_traits.effect:
The following cumulative effects apply to friendly Evergreen Hunt units depending on the number of chords you have:

1 chord – Simple: Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for friendly units wholly within the same quarter of the battlefield as the quarry.

2 chords – Tuneful: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for friendly units’ combat attacks that target an enemy unit wholly within the same quarter of the battlefield as the quarry.

3-5 chords – Melodic: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly units while they are in combat with the quarry.

6+ chords – Mellifluous: While a friendly unit is in combat with the quarry, the quarry has Strike-last.

battle_traits.name: A Prize Quarry is Sighted
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Hero Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 9" of a friendly Evergreen Hunt unit to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: The target becomes the quarry for the rest of the battle. If there was already a quarry on the battlefield when you declared this ability, that unit is no longer the quarry.

battle_traits.name: Abundant Growth
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick each friendly Evergreen Hunt unit that is wholly within 3" of a terrain feature to be the targets.

battle_traits.name: Merciful Strike
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Evergreen Hunt Monster that has not used a Rampage ability this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battle_traits.effect: Roll a dice and add the number of damage points the target has. If the result exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

heroic_traits.name: Sapwood Leader
heroic_traits.effect: If you pick this unit to be a target of the 'Abundant Growth’ ability, Heal (3) this unit instead of Heal (1).

artefacts_of_power.name: Heartwood Hunting Hown
artefacts_of_power.activation: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Hero Phase

abilities.name: Trample Underfoot
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit that is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Envoys of the Everqueen
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective, friendly Sylvaneth units contesting that objective have Ward (6+).

abilities.name: Deploy Wyldwood
abilities.effect: Set up this terrain feature wholly within friendly territory, more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features. This terrain feature has now been deployed.

abilities.name: Growing Woods
abilities.effect: Each time you set up an Awakened Wyldwood, you can place 1-3 scenery pieces (Terrain, 1.6). If you place more than 1 scenery piece, the tips at the end of each base must touch, forming a circle. Add 2 to the Health characteristic of this terrain feature for each additional scenery piece that is placed after the first.

abilities.name: Overgrown Wilderness
abilities.effect: Enemy units can be targeted by shooting attacks made by friendly Sylvaneth units even if they are behind or wholly on this terrain feature (this is an exception to Terrain, 1.2).

abilities.name: Vengeful Forest Spirits
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit within this terrain feature’s combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Forest Fighters
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

abilities.name: Descent of Spiteriders
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Thrumming with Life
abilities.effect: Heal (3) this unit.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Carnelian Greatspite’s Razor-like Mandibles is 3.

abilities.name: Nature Aetheric
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Start of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick a terrain feature within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, the target gains the ‘Place of Power’ terrain ability (Terrain 1.2) and counts as a friendly Awakened Wyldwood for the purposes of the ‘Endless Growth’, ‘Walk the Hidden Paths’ and ‘Strike and Fade’ abilities.

abilities.name: Kurnothi War-horn
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly Sylvaneth units to be the target.
abilities.effect: Each target can use Charge abilities even if they used a Run ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Rhythm of the Chase
abilities.activation: Once per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll, then you can remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield within 1" of the target.

abilities.name: Forest Fighters
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

abilities.name: Harvesters of the Lamentiri
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly unit wholly within 12" of any friendly Revenant Seekers units uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

abilities.name: Thrumming With Life
abilities.effect: Heal (3) this unit.

abilities.name: Tanglethorn Thicket
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. For each 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Envoys of the Everqueen
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective, friendly Sylvaneth units contesting that objective have Ward (6+).

abilities.name: Steady Aim
abilities.effect: This unit can ignore the ‘Guarded Hero’ ability (Core Rules, 25.0) for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Envoys of the Everqueen
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective, friendly Sylvaneth units contesting that objective have Ward (6+).

abilities.name: Crescent Shield
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply to this unit for the rest of the turn:

Defensive Stance: This unit has Ward (4+).

Aggressive Stance: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons, and add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s combat attacks.

abilities.name: Champion of Kurnoth
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Kurnothi units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
